Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Animal behavior , seizures ( time to and incidence ) , death ( time to and incidence ) , and cortical EEG tracings were recorded .

2. Death: While not a disease itself, it can be a result of various diseases or medical conditions.

Therefore, the "Disease" entities in the paragraph are:

* Seizures
* Death (indirectly, as a possible consequence of an underlying disease)
